notification.massage: PMH has deep condolence to all those who have some lost in this COVID-19 pandemic situation. PMH also considers those people thankful due to which we all are able to come over with this situation. We wishes for your better future!
Classes of the continuing students for the Autumn Semester, 2022 will commence from 1st August, 2022 for M.Tech programmes and 8th August, 2022 for other programmes.
